title: A Role That Throws Teaspoons At People

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, choose up to 5 different people to throw Teaspoons at.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- In the day, players with Teaspoons may choose to toss a Teaspoon at another player immediately.
- Any given player cannot toss more than 3 Teaspoons per day, regardless of how many they may have.
- All Teaspoons are secret. They are not announced, and the target only knows they got a Teaspoon, not who sent it.
- At the end of the day, the person with the most Teaspoons will die. However, if there is a tie, nobody will die.
- Teaspoons will last indefinitely until their holder dies.
- You are immune to Teaspoons. If you hold the most at the end of the day, the player with the second-highest Teaspoon count will die instead.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill at least 3 people using Teaspoons. You may win even if you die first.
